title: No signal
body:
Hello,
When I launch a game, before returning to full screen mode (Load Screen). My pc (Screen) turns black, and is marked "No signal" I tried to update my drivers, change the resolution of the game compared to my screen but nothing works. I'm on a TV screen and not on a PC screen but before the game started normally. The other games like Cs go, Rambow six walk very well.
How to do ? It is impossible for me to play Lol at the moment.
DraftClubFr.

replies.body:
You're likely experiencing an issue with the fullscreen resolution that League is trying to run at. I suggest hitting **ALT+ENTER** once you see the loading screen pop up, which should toggle you in a different video mode and resolve this, if the issue was in full screen.

Let me know if this worked.
